text: Abakhongo babakhayi mubandu bebe nibaboola mbu; â€œEfwe shikhukhulolanga noli shiosi shiosi tawe, oli butswa Omundu shinga efwe, ne shikhukhulolanga halali abalondi bao nibo abateshele mwifwe, bakhulondelekhwo khuliparo liokhuchaka, ne shikhubalolanga nimukhushilila shiosishiosi tawe, halali khubaparira mbu muli ababeyi
